display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ulOW2WNMzDoQ7kNvwEqTOGW&_nc_oc=AdmCjPrevpatQhX8umwhV3w2Htq_EnzKLTSwZ4gnJare-vJx6lkTChgFkOEHVz56f7s&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Eheez5-TPaRwG5rouB6DDQ&oh=00_AfuZ3Zy-oaFiC0vzE7pg6IqDrYqCu0R-IlJbQnQm5AEFFA&oe=6994021D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=LH32nexktZkQ7kNvwGUCda3&_nc_oc=AdmegC7H7JkdsZNXOxoL26MRkdVCtWnIpOOKWpmQMHuQnkQFNnWrcJ51J6vEMagk-wM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Eheez5-TPaRwG5rouB6DDQ&oh=00_AfvbvX77bNeUXDDlyoOr_P1vjIclrAZ33e8qS3q-So0k5Q&oe=6993E3D2)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=UQ7pEmWN7vUQ7kNvwGdhmyz&_nc_oc=AdkdphUsV3RXJGKAAki_W8SNxmhpl7mbvEo99HG2eLC3Lb1AKPqqzPdpjWr1aeHzsvU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Eheez5-TPaRwG5rouB6DDQ&oh=00_AfsN9n5zxZ_8jhpolZ90hY2SgbrFplIECu31kcnLbRcZOw&oe=6993E9E3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=YxeBJboqKr8Q7kNvwE5am_C&_nc_oc=AdnkiGOaYjauLqq833VmrE21QjVWJ2BpSTMdmhUzbON750EmpFZ0yAqSYJ0WhhWBxz8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Eheez5-TPaRwG5rouB6DDQ&oh=00_Afv0Q57BbvHni20VRZHF-L8khpQKiEbKNiwLh9XWpMa7yw&oe=6993E06E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RJjJLVhE07QQ7kNvwG1XN25&_nc_oc=AdlbYhjC_37YBpG_8RJ9w2ULzHvSk_gNX6dpp7mvk6TZh0lrwh27W9YB_6IoSdgH-Fk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Eheez5-TPaRwG5rouB6DDQ&oh=00_AfuNOrGXj1MtjLBcbNe2IOFSfqR-XYfAAjVBjJ2KMsHMFA&oe=6993E856)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
